de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.simengine
Interface EventQueue

All Known Implementing Classes:
Calendar
public interface EventQueue

Event scheduling is done by keeping an ordered list of future SimulationEvents waiting to happen. As each simulation event contains the time at which it should occur, the so called event queue has to ensure that events can be fetched in the correct order.

Version:
3.0, 11/29/2007
Author:
Sebastian Kaune, Konstantin Pussep

Method Summary
 boolean empty()
          Return whether event queue is empty.
 void insert(SimulationEvent event)
          Insert event into event queue.
 boolean more()
          Return whether the event queue has more events for concurrent execution.
 SimulationEvent remove()
          Remove first/next event from event queue enabling concurrent handling.
 boolean remove(SimulationEvent event)
          Remove given event from event queue.
 void reset()
          Resets the event queue and remove all events from it.
 int size()
          Return size of event queue.
